comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
v2
v3
verse.lines: Maker of all things, all Thy creatures praise Thee; lo, all things serve Thee, through Thy whole creation: hear us, Almighty, hear us as we raise Thee, heart's adoration.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: To the almighty triune God be glory: highest and greatest, help Thou our endeavor; we, too, would praise Thee, giving honor worthy, now and forever.
